tagline: Designs GraphQL schemas as products — self-documenting, consumer-friendly, built to evolve
pros: Schema-first design that serves clients without mirroring the database
Deep expertise in federation, DataLoader patterns, and query optimization
Schema evolution strategies that don't break existing clients
Strong focus on naming and documentation as API quality
cons: Schema perfectionism can slow delivery when pragmatism would suffice
GraphQL-centric thinking may over-apply GraphQL where REST is simpler
Less effective on projects with simple CRUD and no relational query needs

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
